gym_esper_040_receptionist_01:
Are you ready to challenge Gym Leader Tulip,
the Bewitching Beautician?
gym_esper_040_receptionist_02:
Very well. Allow me to show you to the
battle court.
gym_esper_040_receptionist_03:
Of course. Please feel free to come speak to me
whenever you’re ready.
gym_esper_040_esper_entry_01:
I suppose you’re right. OK, I’ll get things moving
here on my end.[npcn:2C]
gym_esper_040_esper_entry_02:
Let’s keep the tag line simple—
“Naturally Beautiful.”[npcn:2C]
gym_esper_040_esper_entry_03:
And order the new eye-shadow color too,
would you?[npcn:2C]
gym_esper_040_esper_entry_04:
Thanks, you’re a doll. Gotta run now. Chat with
you later.[npcn:2C]
gym_esper_040_esper_02:
I’m Tulip, the Gym Leader here.\c
Though I must tell you that being a makeup artist
is my main line of work.[npcn:1C]
gym_esper_040_esper_03:
Dendra had nothing but praise for you. She said
you totally slayed out there.[npcn:1C]
gym_esper_040_esper_04:
[BD06:0]Hehe. I must say, you are a cute challenger,
[trnm:0].[npcn:1C]
gym_esper_040_esper_05:
I’m sure my ESP exercise made you all the more
beautiful. Doesn’t that make you happy?[npcn:1C]
gym_esper_040_esper_06:
You keep your Pokémon beautiful and clean as
well. I see you have quite the aesthetic sense.[npcn:1C]
gym_esper_040_esper_07:
Appearance is equally important for both people
and Pokémon.[npcn:1C]
gym_esper_040_esper_08:
Makeup is like magic. Anyone can use it to
change their appearance.[npcn:1C]
gym_esper_040_esper_09:
Allow me to put my skills to use to make your
cute little Pokémon even more beautiful![npcn:1C]
gym_esper_040_esper_10:
I lost the battle? And your beauty rivals even my
own? I can’t believe it.[npcn:1C]
gym_esper_040_esper_11: You are quite splendid. Yes, truly amazing![npcn:1C]
gym_esper_040_esper_12:
Perhaps I should take you under my wing before
you make your big break elsewhere...[npcn:1C]
gym_esper_040_esper_13:
But I suppose I need to work on myself a little
more first before I run off and do such a thing.[npcn:1C]
gym_esper_040_esper_14:
You have earned my Gym Badge. Allow me to
strike one of my best poses to give it to you.\r
Congratulations, [trnm:0].[npcn:1C]
gym_esper_040_esper_badge:
With [num1:1] Gym Badge[s:n1], Pokémon of up to Lv. [num2:2]
will be easier to catch and will listen to the\r
commands you give them.[npcn:1C]
gym_esper_040_esper_badge_all:
With all 8 Gym Badges, you’ll be able to catch
Pokémon of any level. They’ll be good Pokémon\r
and listen to your commands, too.[npcn:1C]
gym_esper_040_esper_waza:
If you train hard, you’ll be able to use this move
in a totally perfect way.[npcn:1C]
gym_esper_040_esper_17:
Don’t go uploading that selfie we just took to
social media, OK?[npcn:1C]
gym_esper_040_esper_15:
I think my makeup has run a little with all the
moving and sweating I did during our battle.[npcn:1C]
gym_esper_040_esper_16:
I need to fix it fast before my next appointment.
My schedule is absolutely packed, you know.\c
Farewell, then. You did splendidly today.[npcn:1C]
gym_esper_040_receptionist_04:
Congratulations! You’re now certified by the
Alfornada Gym!
